name: Peace Lily
description: Glossy green leaves with elegant white flowers, thrives in low light and purifies air.

name: Boston Fern
description: Lush, feathery fronds that add humidity and clean indoor air, prefers indirect light.

name: Areca Palm
description: Tall, feathery palm that filters toxins and adds a tropical vibe to spaces.

name: English Ivy
description: Trailing vine with lush green leaves, effective at reducing airborne mold.

name: Rubber
description: Shiny, dark green leaves that purify air, prefers bright indirect light.

name: Lavender
description: Silvery-green foliage with purple flower spikes, known for calming fragrance.

name: Jasmine (Mogra)
description: Sweet-scented white blooms, ideal for gardens or pots near windows.

name: Raat Ki Rani
description: Night-blooming shrub with powerful fragrance, perfect for evening gardens.

name: Gardenia
description: Glossy leaves with creamy, fragrant flowers, known for its rich scent.

name: Scented Geranium
description: Soft, velvety leaves with a rose-like fragrance, great for pots.

name: Spider
description: Green and white striped leaves, hardy and pet-friendly, thrives in various conditions.

name: Snake
description: Upright, sword-like leaves, thrives with minimal care in low light.

name: ZZ
description: Glossy, dark green leaves, drought-tolerant and thrives in low light.

name: Pothos
description: Heart-shaped green leaves with variegation, grows well in low light with little care.

name: Cast Iron
description: Tough, dark green leaves, survives neglect and low light conditions.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Succulent with thick leaves containing soothing gel, used for skin care.

name: Tulsi (Holy Basil)
description: Sacred herb with green leaves, used in teas for respiratory and stress relief.

name: Peppermint
description: Aromatic herb with cooling leaves, used for digestion and headache relief.

name: Chamomile
description: Small, daisy-like flowers used in teas for relaxation and sleep aid.

name: Lemongrass
description: Tall, grassy plant with lemon-scented stalks, used for digestion and teas.

name: Damascus Rose
description: Fragrant rose with edible petals, used in desserts and perfumes.

name: Hibiscus
description: Vibrant red flowers, petals used in teas and culinary dishes.

name: Nasturtium
description: Bright orange and yellow flowers with a peppery flavor, edible leaves and blooms.

name: Rosemary
description: Aromatic herb with needle-like leaves, used in cooking and infusions.

name: Basil
description: Fragrant herb with soft green leaves, perfect for culinary dishes like pesto.
